snippet.title: Armored Core Verdict Day - PS3/X360 - No future for mercs
snippet.description:
Get all the latest screens, dev interviews, and info over on http://www.facebook.com/armoredcore !

In the future, war has ravaged everything. Mysterious towers hold precious resources as factions fight for what they want in a never ending power struggle. You are a mercenary, you fight but it is not your fight. Is it worth living another day if you have no future?

Armored Core Verdict Day is out 27th of September on PS3 and X360.
